data.name: The Absolute Destroyer
data.detailed_description:
Have you ever thought about a superpower you could have?

Well, The Absolute Destroyer gives you the power to destroy everything in your path. In this casual-action game, your mission is to bypass all the obstacles to the end. On the way to your final destination, you will encounter all sorts of difficulties which you need to avoid. But that's not a problem as long as you have a superpower, isn't it? Arm yourself patiently and show everyone who is the strongest!

Game Features :
- A series of levels with random difficulties
- Unforeseen situations with obstacles
- Unlimited attempts

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 210
